bug.description: Describe the bug Update the documentation on how to test jina. Current used testing framework is not unittest, it is pytest. Plus to run some tests, a test docker image must be built. docker build --build-arg PIP_TAG="[devel]" -f Dockerfiles/pip.Dockerfile -t jinaai/jina:test-pip . pip install pytest pip install pytest-xdist pip install pytest-timeout pip install pytest-cov pytest --cov=jina --cov-report=xml -n 1 --timeout=60 -v tests/unit
